data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: In quantum mechanics, momentum is defined as a self-adjoint operator on the wave function. The Heisenberg uncertainty ____ defines ____ on ____ accurately ____ momentum ____ position ____ a ____ observable ____ can ____ known ____ once. In quantum mechanics, position and momentum are conjugate variables.
data.partBlankContent: In quantum mechanics, momentum is defined as a self-adjoint operator on the wave function. The Heisenberg uncertainty prin_____ defines lim___ on h__ accurately t__ momentum a__ position o_ a sin___ observable sys___ can b_ known a_ once. In quantum mechanics, position and momentum are conjugate variables.
data.answer: 在量子力学中，动量被定义为波函数上的自伴随算符。海森堡测不准原理限定了单个可观测系统的动量和位置能在多大程度上被同时知道。在量子力学中，位置和动量是共轭变量。
